name: Scat Cat
description: Scat-cat the kleptomaniac is a notorious thief that lurks in the kingdom of Burgerburg. He steals burgers from the Burgerburgerians to satisfy his appetite. One day, Scat-cat stole the cheesiest cheese whopper from a famous restaurant that is meant for the noble people. Unfortunately, Scat-Cat was spotted by the chef of the restaurant and began to chase him down. The player will take the role of Scat-Cat who will be running and exploring the level to his goal. Scat-Cat has to escape the chef with the burgers that he stole in order to proceed to the next level. The game has unique levels that show the different sceneries of the kingdom of Burgerburg and it gets more difficult as the level increases. Scat-Cat is a clever and athletic thief which makes him an escape artist. It gives the player absolute control over how he/she can guide Scat-Cat to escape its pursuers.
